department.ch: 人工智慧國際碩士學位學程
department.en: International Graduate Program in Artificial Intelligence

goal.ch: 了解最先進的研究知識
goal.en: To know the state of the art

outline.ch:
1) There is a report to submit for each speech.
2) Each student has to turn in 9 reports to receive a passing grade.
3) For in-class attendees, the report is collected at the end of the speech session.
4) For online attendees, the report is collected via eeclass
before the following Sunday 12o’clock (noon).
5) For regular students, up to 3 speech sessions can be viewed online.
6) For vocational students (在職生) or those who have received special permission from theinstructor, up to 9 speech sessions can be viewed online.
outline.en:
1) There is a report to submit for each speech.
2) Each student has to turn in 9 reports to receive a passing grade.
3) For in-class attendees, the report is collected at the end of the speech session.
4) For online attendees, the report is collected via eeclass
before the following Sunday 12o’clock (noon).
5) For regular students, up to 3 speech sessions can be viewed online.
6) For vocational students (在職生) or those who have received special permission from theinstructor, up to 9 speech sessions can be viewed online.

gradMethod.ch:
1) There should be three paragrahs in your report. The first paragraph is the overview ＆ abstract of the speech. The second one is the stregnth/ advantage of the speech (from the technilogical perspective). The third paragraph is the future work/ weakness/ lackness that you believe one can improve.
2) The report should contain adequate detail of the speech.
3) Any unqualified report will be considered as absence.
gradMethod.en:
1) There should be three paragrahs in your report. The first paragraph is the overview ＆ abstract of the speech. The second one is the stregnth/ advantage of the speech (from the technilogical perspective). The third paragraph is the future work/ weakness/ lackness that you believe one can improve.
2) The report should contain adequate detail of the speech.
3) Any unqualified report will be considered as absence.

ch.competencies: 培養人工智慧之專業能力
發展人工智慧技術開發及解決問題之能力
發展人工智慧跨領域應用之能力
培養人工智慧專案溝通與執行之團隊合作能力
拓展國際視野、終身學習及自我學習之能力

en.competencies: To educate students in professional knowledge of Artificial Intelligence
To develop students with the ability to propose AI technology and problem solving skills
To equip students with the means to apply AI technology interdisciplinarily
To improve communications and teamwork skills
To broaden students’ global vision and to build up their self-learning and life-long learning abilities

ch: 系所:限人工智慧國際碩士學位學程。年級:限一年級。
en: Department:International Graduate Program in Artificial Intelligence only.Year:First Year only.
